text:
Nevada Public Notices
The Silver State Health Insurance Exchange
06B-Fiscal_and_Operational_Report_6.30.23_Final
The 
Silver State Health Insurance Exchange
 is the state agency that oversees and operates the online health insurance marketplace, known as Nevada Health Link. We are often referred to as the Exchange. Below you will find reports, Exchange rules and regulations, and budget information. Should you have further inquiries, please reach out to to the Exchange directly by calling 
775-687-9939
.
